title: 85/270/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 April 1985 amending Decision 81/713/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 April 1985
amending Decision 81/713/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
(85/270/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 81/713/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 April 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 59, 5. 3. 1983, p. 34.
(3) OJ No L 257, 10. 9. 1981, p. 28.
(4) OJ No L 315, 5. 12. 1984, p. 22.
(5) OJ No L 108, 26. 4. 1983, p. 18.
